mapper.insert: insert into board (board_title, member_id, board_content, board_x, board_y, board_img) values (#{boardTitle}, #{memberId}, #{boardContent}, #{boardX}, #{boardY}, #{boardImg})
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, member_id, board_hit, board_love, board_register_time, board_x, board_y, board_img from board
mapper.insert: insert into file_upload no, board_no, original_name, save_name, size, delete_yn, created_date, deleted_date values (#{file.no}, #{file.boardNo}, #{originalName}, #{saveName}, #{size}, 0, now(), null)
